Detailed Description

An Effect that performs vector addition to states to which it is applied.

) [static]

Parameters:
s A state
succ The state that should be obtained by applying the new Effect to s. succ must have the same size as s.
dimensions The new Effect will only consider the state indices that appear as keys in this map.

Member Data Documentation

std::vector<std::pair<unsigned,double> > VectorEffect::m_changes [private]

A sparse representation of the state vector to add, assuming that many of the elements of the state vector may be 0.

Each pair in the array associates a state vector index with the value to add to that state variable.
